definitions.definition: included in or planned according to a schedule.
examples: the bus makes one scheduled thirty-minute stop

definitions.definition: (especially of an airline or flight) relating to or forming part of a regular service rather than specially chartered.
arrange or plan (an event) to take place at a particular time.
examples: the release of the single is scheduled for April
synonyms: slate "another meeting was scheduled for April 20"

definitions.definition: make arrangements for (someone or something) to do something.
examples: he is scheduled to be released from prison this spring
